data.title: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
data.description: Studen gets isekaid to another world alongside 3 other people, where they all become heroes, but his only magical power is to summon a multidimensional convenience store, where he can buy food, ingredients and several other things. Leaving the hero position for judge as useless, he decides to use his powers to become a cooker/adventurer, while being...

data.title: Boku no Hero Academia
data.description: Instantly in love and obsessed by this anime. Also love the fact that in this universe everyone had their own will to become the best hero. The introduction to the characters and storywise are well-done crafted especially the USJ fights. It loved to known or understand each of the one class strength and how did they handle to the situations. And especially...

data.title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
data.description: (SPOILERS ARE MARKED) First Isekai I have watched and I probably won't delve too much deeper into the genre outside of konosuba which I am watching simultaneously w/ re: zero. Anyways, this show has a dedicated romantic subplot which I enjoyed throughout as a romance fan and while Subaru is cringe at times, his character development is admirable. Criticisms...

data.title: Bocchi the Rock!
data.description: Better portrayal of social awkwardness than Komi san? Better music than k-on!? Severely hilarious side-splitting comedy? Bocchi the rock has everything. I thought I had decided on my anime of the year in spring, and yet Bocchi the rock completely shocked me and took that spot. Honestly top 5 anime of all time for me. There is not a single flaw I can...
